name: alphavantage
description: Alpha Vantage financial data API integration for stocks, forex, and cryptocurrency market data
author: MCP-Forge Community

api_key.description: Your Alpha Vantage API key (get one free at https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key)

setup_instructions:
1. Sign up for a free API key at https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key
2. The free tier includes 25 requests per day and 5 requests per minute
3. This MCP server provides access to real-time and historical stock prices, forex rates, cryptocurrency data, technical indicators, and fundamental data
